about_the_game:
Experience the Original Soundtrack for Battle Cry of Freedom outside of the game, whenever and wherever you want. This pack includes the Original Soundtrack of Battle Cry of Freedom as well as Concept Art made for the game.

As a bonus, we have also included various currently unused tracks as well as the music from the Battle Cry of Freedom Trailer.

By purchasing this track you are directly supporting the artists who have created this amazing soundtrack. Thank you!
